Title: 38981 - # Best Smartphone Apps for the Entrepreneurial Woman
Direction: 675 words. List and describe 4-8 different apps that would be useful for women who are entrepreneurs. Make sure to discuss a wide range of app types, like apps for planning, scheduling, organization, money management, communication, social media, etc. Your audience will be creative, entrepreneurial women, so keep that in mind when writing this article. You can link to your target URL by mentioning apps that are available for download on IOS devices.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: planning on the iPhone 6

Title: 38983 - # Best iOS Apps for Technology Lovers
